question: 書類
sourceMnemonic: If you put <kanji>writing</kanji> into a <kanji>category</kanji>, you'd have to write it down after you've chosen what category it is in. Where would you write that down? Into a <vocabulary>document</vocabulary>, probably.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
